name: Server Knights
description:
Server Knights is a roguelike tower-defense game. Assist your white knight AI in defending your firewall against the viruses spread by the black knight! Can you defeat this the black knight pestilence and defend your kingdom?!

Server Knights was created in 2 weeks as submission to Roguelike Jam 2, who's theme was web. We interpreted web to mean a digital web, one built of circuits, code, viruses, and AI. The theme not only inspired us visually, but mechanically as well: take note of the web tower, which bridges (webs) to other nearby web towers. The web towers can then both provide a mix of bonuses to the web which are then applied to enemies who path through them.

Click + Drag to play cards!
